content.text: How do you use Lorem Ipsum in VS code A tiny VS Code extension made up of a few commands that generate and insert lorem ipsum text into a text file. To use the extension, open the command palette (F1 or cmd/ctrl+shift+p, type and select to insert either a line or paragraph.
